{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.13067v1", "title": "Comment on 'Product states and Schmidt rank of mutually unbiased bases
  in dimension six'", "summary": "A lemma by Chen et al. [J. Phys. A: Math. Theor. 50, 475304 (2017)] provides
a necessary condition on the structure of any complex Hadamard matrix in a set
of four mutually unbiased bases in $\mathbb{C}^6$. The proof of the lemma is
shown to contain a mistake, ultimately invalidating three theorems derived in
later publications.", "main_category": "quant-ph", "categories": "quant-ph", "published": "2025-04-17T16:25:55Z"}
